content: पित्र्य {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [पितुरिदं प्रियं वा पितृत आगतं वा यत्] {@--1@} Paternal, patrimonial, ancestral. {@--2@} ({%a%}) Relating or sacred to the deceased ancestors; <ls>Ms. 2 59.</ls> ({%b%}) Obsequial. --त्र्यः {@--1@} The eldest brother. {@--2@} The month of Māgha. --त्र्या {@--1@} The constellation called Maghā. {@--2@} The day of full as well as new moon. --त्र्यं {@--1@} The lunar mansion called Maghā. {@--2@} The part of the hand between the fore-finger and the thumb (sacred to the Manes).
